website_summaries.verdict: This set of four massage stones are each hand-selected and are just the right smoothness for the perfect glide.
pros: Basalt stone offers terrific heat retention for extended stone massages
Stones are guaranteed to be clean and smooth, without cracks
cons: Some have said they are thicker than expected

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and I like to incorporate warm stones in trouble areas on my clients. This set of 4 was all I needed. I like the natural shape of the stones, how they are all similar sizes, and they work great with massage oil. I even had one client ask for a set so I gave mine to her and ordered them a second time. The second set was just as good as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle H

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service!
customer_reviews.text: Got what I ordered, a little early!!! Stone were very nice, clean, smooth and the price was fair! Plus 2 extra stones as a gift. I was surprised as this is my 1st set ever ordered but I did research and the basalt stones were rated best for massage so I want to thank yall for my gift and the order being what you did it would be!! Will refer y'all to ppl!! Thank you again!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy NCGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these stones. They arrived early and also gifted me two extra stones. They are quite large and fit nicely in my hand. They are exactly like at the spa, just what I was hoping for. Definitely happy with my purchase and recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Leaf

customer_reviews.title: only thing I can say to make them better is to set a reminder to use them
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these. Seriously, only thing I can say to make them better is to set a reminder to use them. Also, be safe, make sure you follow instructions and heat in water. DO NOT HEAT IN MICROWAVE
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Dad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rocks for Massage, crafting, painting
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent Large Stones. Very symmetrical and come un-oiled which I love. You can apply oil alone or oil and cream or you can just paint them and hide them like all of these find the rocks Facebook pages are trending. These rocks habe multiple use. Create a craft of one oiled and one not to create a demensional sign. That's why when I read in the description that these rocks were not oiled I have to buy them. They let me be in control of my craft. Pictures are exactly how the rocks came out of the bag/box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Just what I needed. I hurt my ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Just what I needed. I hurt my knee moving and found that leg massages helped. Rather than going to a salon, I now do it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Reka

customer_reviews.title: Love these stones
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a professional, but these stones work perfectly in our home. I bought them for a "spa night" date, but we continue to use them! They heat up quickly and hold heat well. They are the perfect palm size and 8 is the perfect number for a quick and easy full body massage. 4 for the back, 1 for each arm and leg. You definitely would want a more varied set and a large sacral stone if you really want to spend more time massaging feet/ hands etc. or if you want a stone for the tailbone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy, look closer into size
customer_reviews.text: Again, can not blame then too much since i did not really read exact size before ordering, just ordered medioum, and their medioum definetly was alot smaller then my assumed medioum. Other then that very smooth and very nice curve feels extremly good in gands, pleasant color, other then that, its a rock, all rocks do same job of holding good amount of heat and being able to realese it
customer_reviews.author: ilya

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Stones
customer_reviews.text: These stones are of good size, smooth feel and good weight . They heat welll in hot water and hold their heat for a decent amount of time to insure a good spa like use
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stones! I got the large ones and I love the size, shape, heat retention. They are super smooth and glide over the skin wonderfully. I am a massage therapist and I bought these for home use on myself, I love them so much now I want to buy the whole kit for my studio and replace the stones I currently use.
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: large stones, smooth and hold heat well.
customer_reviews.text: These stones are a little bit too large for hand held massage but are great for laying on the base of the spine or other areas that can use deep heat penetration. I got the medium sized which are great for massage. Planning on getting the small ones for between the toes. They are all smooth and equal in size.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy CG

customer_reviews.title: These stones are excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the stones I use for hot stone massage, I use these the most. They are the perfect size to hold and massage with. I appreciate the natural shape of these stones and the surface has the perfect "drag." Not to slick and not to rough.
customer_reviews.author: Jonna King

customer_reviews.title: They came in a clear plastic bag and are pretty durable so didn't require special packaging
customer_reviews.text: These massage stones were as expected. They came in a clear plastic bag and are pretty durable so didn't require special packaging. My wife used them to massage me once so far and they felt good as expected. Good shape but could be considered medium sized depending on what you expect large-sized to be. It was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the product is fine, they are rocks, but The packaging leaves a lot to be desired. I bought these as a birthday gift for my daughter, whom is starting massage school. Otherwise, good size and eight came in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Rea Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great stones, perfect size for hand holding massage.
customer_reviews.text: Stones are beautiful. Smooth, same size. They are great to massage with and hold heat well. I am completely satisfied. I also got the large ones which cover a large area. I am planning on getting the small ones for between the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy CG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a spinal layout
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of 8 to add to my current collection of basalt rocks. TIR always offers THE BEST stones for my massage practice. I will order again as needed. A. Fierro LMT
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it for at home massages
customer_reviews.text: These rocks are hard to use if using by yourself. They slip off easily. So the large stones are not very large. Plus it’s hard to heat them in the pot and get them the right temp. If you leave in too long they’re too hot and if you take them out early they’re too cool. Not really worth it
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied and happy!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I appreciated the personal email from the seller of the stones which was great, shared about the business and also had contact information if I had any questions. Second they got shipped so fast! 2 days it took which was awesome. Third the stones were great, I used them on my husband and he loved them. They heated up so good in a crock pot, and were the perfect size. They even had a website of their own for instructions how to use and other information, which was great cause I never used these before. So overall I would totally recommend anyone to buy these from here!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome items! Exactly was was described. Fits perfectly in ones hand and holds heat well!
customer_reviews.author: Serving for HIM

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly smooth good size rocks.
customer_reviews.text: These stones are great! I dont know much about stones but they seem great quality and they are perfectly smooth. I was happy with my purchase :) I intend to use them for massages and to keep my bath water warm. I also love that it's a small company as I love supporting small businesses. Also, they are palm sized stones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like these.
customer_reviews.text: They heat up nicely & retain the heat. Feel good in the hands & on the body. Like using them. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tetrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Stones that Heat Well
customer_reviews.text: great quality, heat evenly, seller even threw in 2 free extra stones! Great customer service and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these hot stones
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these hot stones! Got a surprise "gift" of one large free stone in our order. Pleasant surprise. These stones are the real deal. Warm up and keep heat nicely. Our whole family is enjoying them after tough work outs. Thank you! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MOMOf3NJ

customer_reviews.title: Best stones!!
customer_reviews.text: These stones come un-oiled. This is fantastic and I felt really gives the buyer full control over how they proceed with using the stones. Lightly oil, heavily oil, paint them whatever your purpose for them they are perfect. Buy the stones you won't regret their use! The pictures I posted are how they come straight out of the bag/box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and Love them. Stay hot, perfect size. I want to buy larger ones too for the lower back area. And smaller ones for the toes.

customer_reviews.title: Returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t hold heat any better than the River rock that I already had in my yard. Returned for money back

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: Received the stones quicker than I had been told when would arrive. The stones are exactly the size and weight I expected. I read others reviews where they received a surprise in their box. I too received 4 additional stones of equal quality, and a little smaller which is great. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them though
customer_reviews.text: I read online how to warm and use, but as a first time user, instructions would be helpful. I absolutely love them though! Makes giving a message much easier too!

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re Shrek these will fit your toes! They’re huge!

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Bag came opened. Stones were fine other than a crack down the middle of one, not an issue for me. Product held it's heat well. I pictured the stones to be a tad bigger but they fit my hands just fine and did the job.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: My husband has had very bad sciatica pain which starts in buttocks and goes down ...
customer_reviews.text: The stones arrived quickly and were just the right size. My husband has had very bad sciatica pain which starts in buttocks and goes down his leg. The hot stone massages have given him so much relief before going to bed that he is sleeping much better.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Get hot then cool down to the desired temp with a little lukewarm water. It is a lot easier to get them the right tempt that way then trying to heat them to the correct temp up front.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost every day in my massage business. They're terrific--uniform, flat. Arrived quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Revised: Not so hot stones
customer_reviews.text: After submitting my review the seller contacted me explaining more details on the stones. Since they responded I have decided to revise my review. I do feel it would be very helpful if they gave you some kind of instructions. I was so excited to get these massage stones only to be disappointed that they do not hold heat more then a minute. I put them in boiling water and are super hot at first but it's short lived.
customer_reviews.author: AlisaC

customer_reviews.title: These were not like the rocks at the nail salon
customer_reviews.text: We probably need to watch the video, but we had a few concerns. These were not like the rocks at the nail salon. Size is right, and there is potential. We soaked them in oil for a few day, and that helped greatly. We heated them in the microwave...but they go from screaming hot to cold. I think the steamer would be a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unless someone on here can recommend. The website is not valid
customer_reviews.text: I am thinking of returning. Should have read more about if microwaving. I need for my leg and I heard stones that get wrapped in towels correct will reduce the varicose veins. Unless someone on here can recommend. The website is not valid. That is misleading. No directions on how to use these proper.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Small and don't get or stay hot enough
customer_reviews.text: These do not heat up well and don't stay hot long enough for me. I use an "Elite Towel Cabbie" warmer to warm them, it's the same make and model warmer used at the spa I work at and I turn it on for over 2 hours before any clients even show up so the stones should be very hot and stay hot for quite awhile after pulling them from the cabbie. Plus they're very small. I ordered some medium sized stones at the same time and I can tell them apart from the "large" ones. I'm going to try buying stones from massagewarehouse.com next....
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schuster

The only turn-off is the amount of dirt or dust that was in the bag, it was like getting a bag of rocks picked up from the ground without being cleaned off first.

customer_reviews.title: Very please

customer_reviews.title: smooth surface, nice size, hold heat a long time so brings sustained muscle relaxation and happiness
customer_reviews.text: If you have rocks like this nearby for free, why buy. But if you need some these are wonderful as noted in the headline. Very soothing when placed on ones back, shoulders, abdomenor legs. I heat them in a sink or container of hot water then dry thembefore use. Be careful to not put them directly on skin if too hot; can put cloth or towel on skin then the rocks. can retain heat longer if cover with a towel

customer_reviews.title: but they glide nicely with my massage gel so it works out fine

I am a massage therapist and recently opened my own office. I needed some stones to add to my collection without breaking the budget. These worked out great.

They are nice stones and hold heat really well but you might as well order the mediums and get more for you money. They send you 8 medium stones for $5 more than the 4 "large" stones.

product_meta.title: TIR Massage Stone - Set of 4 - Natural Basalt Massage Stones (NOT from China & not cut) - Professional or At Home Use - Size: Large (3.0 to 3.5 inches)
feature_bullets: 4 LARGE MASSAGE STONES: each stone is hand-selected to fit within a range of 3.0 to 3.5 inches in diameter
MASSAGE STONE QUALITY: Each stone goes through a proprietary treatment process and then sorted and paired by our expert team to give you clean, smooth and fully-usable stones.

A SMALL BUSINESS (that's real): We're a small family business in Arizona. Since 2005 we've supplied massage stone set to tens of thousands of people throughout the world. We don't source through China and ship direct to Amazon's warehouse, never to see the product or care about the results like many private label sellers on Amazon.
THE TEXTURE YOU NEED: Just the right smoothness for a perfect glide (not rough or too slippery)

NATURAL BASALT STONE: We give you what natured intended them to be, beautiful stones with their own unique variation and character with perfect smoothness and heat retention (since they are Basalt Stones). Stone color is gray upon receipt, becomes black/gray with oil.
